aws_iam_access_key.description: Provides an IAM access key. This is a set of credentials that allow API requests to be made as an IAM user.

user.description: The IAM user to associate with this access key.

pgp_key.description: Either a base-64 encoded PGP public key, or a

status.description: The access key status to apply. Defaults to `Active`.

user.description: The IAM user associated with this access key.

key_fingerprint.description: The fingerprint of the PGP key used to encrypt

secret.description: The secret access key. Note that this will be written

encrypted_secret.description: The encrypted secret, base64 encoded, if `pgp_key` was specified.

ses_smtp_password.description: **DEPRECATED** The secret access key converted into an SES SMTP

ses_smtp_password_v4.description: The secret access key converted into an SES SMTP
